discussion.notes: The week was a little rough, health-wise as well. There were hurdles in the progress, but all four tabs of the app are now done.

The daily statistics view is a bit difficult. A weekly interval would be helpful, but this would help in user retention as they're unlikely to see statistics and interact with the app until the seventh day.
Deployment should ideally be done without the need to buy a server. After that, evaluations can run.
